channel.title: Virtue - The Original
channel.description:
I am sick and tired of people releasing leaked versions of Virtue. For example, Krithium. The source is packed with garbage and the original is still 10 times better.
This has never been officially released, persay, but it has been leaked and has been passed on from friend to friend. I guess Luka and I (who isn't active anymore) secede the power to release this after scott since we paid $400 for it. Initially we were scared of it being released because we were excited we had something unique finally. I am still working on a server based off this, but development wise, its far out of reach of most people so I am no longer worried about it.
Media and information can be found here: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/420358-virtue-exceeding-expectations.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/420358-virtue-exceeding-expectations.html[/url]
Download Link: [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download/bft8bln455k9nx7/Virtue.rar"]Includes Server, Client and Cache[/URL]
Credits: Scott 100% - This is his work and his alone. This is how it is when we bought it from him. This is the exact package he sent us. You can see the last modified date is December 9, 2012 if you care. :P
STOP WITH THE ****ING GARBAGE LEECHES AND USE THE ORIGINAL.
/rant

item.description:

[quote=“Sundin100, post:42, topic:534008”][quote author=williams15 link=topic=652803.msg4398255#msg4398255 date=1389766968]

That error is LITERALLY telling you what happened lol, “File not found: src\engine\packet*.java”
[/quote] how can we fix it ?

Same please anyone?

EDIT: I would really like this source working but get the same compilation errors as previously stated, so I took that line out and got 100 errors, then tried to run it and got the errors previously stated for the run.bat. Tried commenting out that line but it wouldn’t have any of it. Help PLEASEE![/quote]

Any errors you get just post in the server and/or Client help and you will be helped

Read full topic
